# German Chocolate Cake

## Ingredients

* 0.5 cups margarine
* 2/3 - 0.5 cup sugar
* 1 egg
* 1.5 cups flour
* 0.25 cups unsweetened cocoa
* 2 Tbl baking powder
* jelly/marmalade

## Instructions

Mex everything together in a food processor. Press half of hte dought on the bottom of a spring-form cake pan. Spread any kind of jelly or marmalade on the dough. Put the other half of hte dough on top of the jelly. Bake at 352&deg;F for about 50 minutes. When cool, spread the powdered sugar through a strainer on the top.
